snippet: Real Madrid forward Cristiano Ronaldo has been sued over “CR7,” which he uses as shorthand for his name.
abstract: American man Christopher Renzi sues Real Madrid soccer star Cristiano Ronaldo in trademark dispute over CR7 moniker that is used in his merchandise; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Real Madrid forward Cristiano Ronaldo has been sued over “CR7,” which he uses as shorthand for his name.

headline.main: Suit Disputes Use of Ronaldo's ‘CR7’ Nickname
